name: How to keep your feet dry in the rain
name_original: How to keep your feet dry in the rain
description:
Our submission for the 48 hours  Random WikiHown Jam #2.

The Theme generated for us is "How To Keep Your Feet Dry In The Rain". It was an absolute blast, a great yet still challenging 2 Days for us. Hence we're even more happy to show you what we came up with. We created a kind of simulation game with the goal to reach your home, without getting those socks wet. Puddles of water, cars splashing water and just the pure rain work against you. Can you make it?

Have fun playing and don't get wet! :)

Contributors:

- iFL3x

- Snotax

Gamejam theme (Wikihow):

https://www.wikihow.com/Keep-Your-Feet-Dry-in-the-Rain
